alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 5:59PM CDT until March 31 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...TORNADO EMERGENCY FOR COVINGTON... ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TIPTON...SOUTHEASTERN LAUDERDALE AND WEST CENTRAL HAYWOOD COUNTIES... At 559 PM CDT, a confirmed large and destructive tornado was located over Covington, moving northeast at 40 mph. TORNADO EMERGENCY for COVINGTON. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW! HAZARD...Deadly tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Ripley, Brighton, Henning, Burlison, Garland, Orysa, Bride, Durhamville, Gift, Tabernacle, Turnpike, Opossum and Rialto. TORNADO...OBSERVED TORNADO DAMAGE THREAT...CATASTROPHIC MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a large, extremely dangerous, and potentially deadly tornado is on the ground. To protect your life, TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If in a mobile home, a vehicle or outdoors, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
